posts.post_content:
1/3 of Tinkers to Evers to Chance in PSA 2 condition is now available.

You cannot get from Tinker to Chance with going through Evers.

This example features the yellow sky (?) and the Chicago shirt.

John must have been lying on his stomach for a few years as the back is well toned.  Maybe that yellow sky is due to an exceptionally bright sun.

This card has been sold.

Any form of payment will do.  


[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-psa/10427/evers-batting-chicago-shirt[/IMG]
